//const BASE_URL = 'https://register.nomoreparties.co';
var BASE_URL='https://api.ws.p15.students.nomoreparties.site';export var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({"name":"Name","about":"About me","avatar":"https://icon-library.com/images/default-user-icon/default-user-icon-6.jpg","password":password,"email":email})}).then(function(res){if(res.status===201){return res.json();}else{throw new Error('Unsuccessful registration');}});};export var authorize=function authorize(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({"password":password,"email":email})}).then(function(res){if(res.status===201){return res.json();}else{throw new Error('Unsuccessful login');}}).then(function(data){console.log(data);localStorage.setItem('jwt',data.token);return true;});};export var getUser=function getUser(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){return res.json();}});};
